alert.note: Alert for Magoffin; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:39PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Breathitt, central Magoffin and east central Wolfe Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 439 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mountain Valley, or 8 miles northeast of Jackson, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dale and Cutuno around 445 PM EDT. Cornelia, Eugene, Puncheon, Seiltz and Epson around 450 PM EDT. Fritz, Foraker, Ova, Stella and Hager around 455 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hendricks, Gullett, Lakesville, Carver, Carver Station, Gifford, Tiptop, Salyersville, Mason, Skaggs, West Royalton Station, Sublett, Royalton, Conley Station, Swampton, Stringtown, Bradley, Ivyton, Burning Fork, Conley, Marshallville, Mashfork, Gypsy and Gapville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
